Texto: 
vs, cbc & cmp wnl; no signs of endocrinologic dysfunction.
surveillance ct in 6-12 months given hx of breast cancer
2.6cm x 1.9cm left adrenal mass
adrenal adenoma
• metastatic disease (from her known breast ca)
• adrenal adenoma
• pheochromocytoma
• granulomatous disease
• adrenal ganglioneuroma
• adrenal cortical carcinoma
40 y.o. woman with hx stage iiib breast cancer s/p left mastectomy & lymph node dissection
